name: Subject/Course Dashboard Notion Template
description: This is a sample template to give you an idea of how you can structure a Notion page for a particular subject. This template doesn't contain any actual notes, but you can use it as a starting point as a template. I used the VCE Biology 3/4 study design as an example.Includes:Pomodoro timerClass NotesAssignment trackerExam Practice pageDuplicate for free by putting 0 in the price box, or tip an amount of your choice.Let me know what other templates you'd like me to make. Free free to DM me if you
features: Pomodoro timer; Class Notes; Assignment tracker; Exam Practice page
